name: Brain Sync AI
introduction: Web application that uses AI to create personalized learning paths, flashcards, and quizzes for users.
goals: This project is designed as a personal learning initiative with the following goals: Deepen knowledge in Artificial Intelligence with a particular focus on developing localized solutions | Learn frontend development with React | Explore backend development using Python and Flask.

name: EC Portfolio
introduction: Website to showcase a photographer's work.
goals: The goal for this project was to create an interactive website while deepening my knowledge of modern frontend tools and techniques : Enhance frontend development skills using Nuxt.js | Explore smooth scrolling techniques with Lenis | Implement dynamic animations with GSAP to create an engaging user experience | Get started with WebGL and Three.js to explore 3D web graphics.

name: Whisked DC
introduction: Designed and implemented a compliance traceability system for an industrial baking company, ensuring accurate tracking and adherence to regulatory standards.
goals: Led the end-to-end development of a cost-effective traceability system, from gathering client requirements to training end users. The solution integrated seamlessly with the client’s existing Google-based workflows, featuring custom forms, logs, and dashboards. It improved product traceability speed by 60% while staying within budget.

name: Meritis
introduction: Project Four intro: Pushing the boundaries of web development.
goals:
Contributed to the architecture and development of scalable microservices, creating Dockerized connectors (C# | Kafka) to integrate HR data across 10 platforms like Salesforce, SmartRecruiters, TalentSoft and SharePoint.

  ● Designed and implemented CI/CD pipelines in Azure DevOps using tools like Gitleaks-Check, OWASP Dependency-Check, and SonarQube to automate the detection of vulnerabilities in 100% of packages and reduce code smells by 40%.

introduction: Project Four intro: Pushing the boundaries of web development.
goals:
Contributed to the architecture and development of scalable microservices, creating Dockerized connectors (C# | Kafka) to integrate HR data across 10 platforms like Salesforce, SmartRecruiters, TalentSoft and SharePoint.

  ● Designed and implemented CI/CD pipelines in Azure DevOps using tools like Gitleaks-Check, OWASP Dependency-Check, and SonarQube to automate the detection of vulnerabilities in 100% of packages and reduce code smells by 40%.

name: Origins Track
introduction: Transparent and secure food traceability with a blockchain platform.
goals: Transparent and secure food traceability. The 'OriginsTrack' project aims to create a blockchain platform that will allow consumers to trace the provenance of their food back to its source.
